title: Joan The Alien
description:
Description :
        I only have two years to live. With a smothering, toxic gray sky, life on earth is no longer the same. Io has been wearing a Purity Suit for 28 years, until he discovers that it had been defective his whole life. His disease was actually caused by his suit.
